page.title: 08Cuxton School
page.content: The original primary school was opened in 1906. The village grew and a separate Junior Dept. was opened in 1968. The first building became the Infant Dept. where there are now 108 children in 4 classes. The Junior building has 6 classrooms with 180 children. We have a library where we find out things from books. In the hall we do P.E., watch TV. and have lunch. We have 2 large playgrounds where we skip and play ball. Most children learn to swim in our swimming pool. We have a large playing field at the top of the bank, with woods on the far side. At lunch-time the kitchen provides about 50 meals and 100 children bring pack lunch.
